title: Midterm Madness
description:
Each week, Norm Ornstein and Kavita Patel, we will talk about the issues facing our country as we head into the midterms and what our leaders are saying and doing about them. We hope you like the show and we'd love to hear your feedback. If you have any comments feel free to send us an email at podcasts@thedsrnetwork.com.
On this week's episode, we talk about all the races we are following for the midterms, and our campaign experiences. You won't want to miss it!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
